lexUnit.name: decanter.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a stoppered glass container into which wine or spirit is decanted

sentence.text: It 's what will WE do ? " he replied , rising from his chair to kiss her lightly on the forehead on his way to the Scotch decanter .
